item.title: Self-hosting Local LLMs (DeepSeek-R1) Easily with Harbor (Ollama+Open-WebUI+SearXNG)
item.description: Lately, there is a need of private chatbot service as a complete alternative to OpenAI’s ChatGPT. So, I decide to implement one at home and make it accessible to everyone in my household alongside with my network printer and NAS (OpenMediaVault). In the past, I used to recommend others using Llama series for English tasks and Qwen series for Chinese tasks. There were no open-source model that strong enough in multilingual tasks comparing to proprietary ones (GPT/Claude).
